metadata.title: ShelfCare - Sustainable Fashion and Wardrobe Care
metadata.description: ShelfCare is dedicated to making clothing, shoe, and accessory repair and maintenance services accessible. We integrate these services into consumers’ wardrobe care routines, promoting sustainable fashion and personal style. Embrace quality over quantity with ShelfCare, where your beloved clothes and unique style are the focus.
metadata.keywords: ShelfCare, sustainable fashion, wardrobe care, clothing repair, shoe maintenance, accessory repair, personal style, quality over quantity, fashion sustainability

hero.title: One-stop-shop for high quality tailoring, cobbler and laundry services
hero.subtitle: Order now and we will come to pick up your items for servicing.

how_it_works.title: How the service works
how_it_works.subtitle: Get started with these easy steps:

step1.title: Submit a service request
step1.description: Fill out the form on our website to begin your service request.

step2.title: Receive order confirmation
step2.description: If needed, we verify the work with our service providers before confirming.

step3.title: We collect the items
step3.description: We pick up your items at the time you selected.

step4.title: Services are performed
step4.description: If necessary, we ask clarifying questions to ensure the desired outcome.

step5.title: Items are returned
step5.description: We deliver your serviced items back at the time you selected.

mission-vision.title: Our Mission & Vision
mission-vision.mission: Our mission is to make fashion repair and maintenance services accessible, and establish these services as a part of your regular activity for wardrobe care and sustainable fashion consumption.
mission-vision.vision: ShelfCare stands for the new age of fashion industry where quality cancels out quantity. Instead of following the trends and continuous consumption, the focus is on personal style, perfectly fitting and beloved clothes which their owners want to take care of.

tailoring.title: Tailoring
tailoring.description: Get your clothes repaired and altered to perfection, whether it’s adjusting the length, fit, or style.You’ll get more wear out of your garments when they fit well and feel comfortable.

laundry.title: Laundry
laundry.shortDescription: Keep your garments fresh and clean.
laundry.description: Our laundry service provides professional cleaning for your clothes, with special care given to delicate fabrics. We keep your clothes fresh and well-maintained and they continue to look great over time.

cobbler.title: Cobbler
cobbler.shortDescription: Revive your favorite shoes with care.
cobbler.description: Our cobblers repair, restore, and maintain your shoes, bags, and leather goods. With cobbler services you can extend the lifespan of your items.

order-start.title: Want to fix an item?
order-start.subtitle: Start by selecting the type of item (clothing, shoes, leather goods) you want to fix.
order-start.error: Please select an item type to continue.

team.title: Meet our beautiful team
team.description: Our values are simple, we believe in circularity, self-expression, and self-care.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully!
contact.errorMessage: There was an error sending the message, please try again later.

general.heading: 1. General
general.content: These terms of service apply to the tailoring, cobbler, and laundry services provided by ShelfCare Ltd ('we', 'our', or 'the company'). By ordering our services, you ('you' or 'the customer') agree to comply with these terms.

ordering.heading: 2. Ordering Services
ordering.content: Ordering services takes place through our website. The customer is responsible for ensuring that the information provided in the order form, such as measurements and specifications, is correct and accurate. The order is confirmed once we have received all the necessary information. We reserve the right to reject the order if the information is incomplete or incorrect.

pricing.heading: 3. Pricing and Payment Terms
pricing.content: Service prices are visible on our website. By ordering, you agree to pay for the services according to the price list. If the scope of work exceeds the definition of the ordered service, we will agree separately with the customer on the service and price.

transport.heading: 4. Transportation Service
transport.content: We offer a pickup and return service to the address provided by the customer. We charge a €10 transportation and service fee at the time of order. Pickup and return times are agreed upon with the customer. The customer must be present at the agreed time.

handling.heading: 5. Product Handling and Quality
handling.content: We commit to handling the customer's products properly and professionally. If the customer is not satisfied with the quality of the service, they must notify us in writing within 7 days of the return of the products.

liability.heading: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: We are not responsible for any damage to products that result from incorrect measurements or information provided by the customer.

cancellation.heading: 7. Cancellation Policy
cancellation.content: The customer may cancel the order free of charge before the products are picked up. If cancellation is made after pickup but before the work has started, the customer is liable to pay for the transportation costs.

privacy.heading: 8. Privacy and Data Protection
privacy.content: We are committed to protecting the personal data of customers and processing it in accordance with data protection legislation.

other.heading: 9. Other Terms
other.content: We reserve the right to change these terms without notice. Changes will take effect when published on our website.

contact.heading: 10. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these terms, you can contact us by email at maija.tunturi@shelfcare.app.

section4.heading: 4. Purpose and Legal Basis for Processing Personal Data
section4.content:
The purpose of processing personal data includes:
- Providing customer service
- Sending marketing communications
- Fulfilling contractual obligations
- Complying with legal requirements

The legal basis for processing personal data includes:
- Customer consent
- Performance of a contract
- Legal obligations of the data controller
- Legitimate interests of the data controller

section5.heading: 5. Content of the Register
section5.content:
The register may contain the following information:
- Name
- Address
- Phone number
- Email address
- Information related to the customer relationship (e.g., order history, customer feedback)

section6.heading: 6. Regular Data Sources
section6.content:
Personal data is primarily collected:
- Directly from the customer during the customer relationship
- When the customer uses services provided by ShelfCare Oy

section7.heading: 7. Regular Data Disclosures
section7.content:
Personal data may be disclosed to:
- Our service providers and partners who process data on our behalf
- Authorities in cases required by law

section8.heading: 8. Transfer of Data Outside the EU or EEA
section8.content: Personal data is generally not transferred outside the EU/EEA. If a transfer is necessary, we ensure that it occurs legally and with adequate safeguards.

section9.heading: 9. Rights of the Data Subject
section9.content:
The data subject has the following rights:
- Right to access their personal data
- Right to correct data
- Right to delete data
- Right to restrict processing
- Right to object to data processing
- Right to data portability
- Right to withdraw consent at any time

Data subjects can exercise their rights by contacting our Data Protection Officer. All requests must be submitted in writing to the contact person mentioned above.

section10.heading: 10. Changes to the Privacy Policy
section10.content: ShelfCare Oy reserves the right to change this privacy policy. Changes will be announced on the ShelfCare Oy website and/or to customers via email.

pricing.title: Pricing Guidelines
pricing.disclaimer: The prices listed are starting prices and may vary based on the complexity and materials involved in each service. Additional charges may apply.

narrowing_exceeding_4cm.name: Narrowing is done from the side seams when the narrowing is more than 4cm.

jeans_narrowing_exceeding_4cm.name: Narrowing is done from the side seams when the narrowing is more than 4cm.

dresses_narrowing_exceeding_4cm.name: Narrowing is done from the side seams when the narrowing is more than 4cm.
Narrowing is done from the side seams when the narrowing is more than 4cm.

sleeve_shortening_relocation_welt.name: Sleeve Shortening with Relocation of Welt

sleeve_shortening_relocation_zipper.name: Sleeve Shortening with Relocation of Zipper

instructions.instruction-1: Measure and tell the number of centimeters from the leg/hem/cuff/waist to the point where you want the tapering to start.
instructions.instruction-2: Specify the amount of reduction needed.
instructions.instruction-3: If narrowing only from the waist, specify where it ends by measuring the number of centimeters from the hem to that point.
instructions.instruction-4: Alternatively, mark the points with safety pins.

instructions.instruction-1: Measure and specify the amount to shorten. You can also mark the shortening with a safety pin.
Measure and tell how much you want to move the buttons for narrowing or widening.
instructions.instruction-2: Alternatively, mark with safety pins where the buttons will be moved.

instructions.instruction-1: Measure and specify where to start widening from the waist down, and how much to widen from the waist.
instructions.instruction-2: Ensure there is enough extra fabric inside the back seam of the pant.

instructions.instruction-1: Measure and specify how much to extend the sleeve length.
instructions.instruction-2: Ensure there is extra fabric on the sleeve for lengthening.

instructions.instruction-1: Identify the location of the repair point.
instructions.instruction-2: Seam repairs are done inconspicuously, though complete invisibility may not be achieved.

order-details.title: Order Details
order-details.additionalNotesPlaceholder: Add any specific instructions or notes for your adjustments...
order-details.uploadImagesSubtitle: Please upload images showing the specific areas that need adjustments.
order-details.dragAndDropFiles: Drag & drop files here, or click to select files

order.title: Place Your Order
order.subtitle: Choose pickup and return time, fill in order information and your contact information. You don't have to pack the items - we bring the bags for it.
order.subtitle-2: Check out the price list <link1>here</link1> and the measurement guide <link2>here</link2>. €10 service and logistics fee is added to all orders. You will receive an invoice via email after pickup.
order.pickupDateLabel: When do we pick up the goods?
order.returnDateLabel: When do we return the items back to you?
order.returnPickupDateDescription: Services are performed within 7 days - the first option for return date is a week after the pickup.
order.orderImageInstruction: Upload images showing the specific areas that need adjustments.
order.orderDetailsInstruction1: In the order details, fill in the items you are sending and what services you want. State measurement information if needed. Let us know if you want us take your measurements during pickup.
order.orderDetailsInstruction2: You can also leave questions about the order and the packages here, and the order will be confirmed later.
order.orderDetailsPlaceholder: Order details e.g., 'Silk shirt, shorten sleeve by 2cm...'
order.successMessage: Your order has been submitted successfully!
order.error: There was an error. Please try again later.

user-dashboard.profile-subtitle: This information will be used for shipping and billing purposes.
user-dashboard.order-subtitle: Check the status of recent orders, manage returns, and make payments.
user-dashboard.welcome-message:
Welcome to ShelfCare! 
Share pictures of the items you need repaired or maintained. We'll ask for any necessary details and provide you with a service plan, including pricing. After that, you'll receive available pickup options.
